vclaim: Dear @IAF_MCC received these 👇👇👇 on WhatsApp (sent to me for verifying the truth)Will action be initiated against those spreading fake news?Please don't allow politicisation of the Armed Forces.@Twitter@TwitterIndia may like to look into this pic.twitter.com/YAQVGAkYVE
